mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, username, inputtime, tel, email, state, admin, dep_id, password) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{inputtime}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{state}, #{admin}, #{department.id}, #{password})
mapper.update: update employee set username = #{username}, inputtime = #{inputtime}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, admin = #{admin}, dep_id = #{department.id}, password = #{password} where id = #{id}

where.if: and e.username like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or e.tel like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or e.email like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
